name: @rildev/minimal-css
description: Make your prototypes look good with a standard minimal css stylesheet (< 1Kb)!

scripts.publish: git switch -C package && rm -rv * && git restore -s master -- package.json style.min.css && mv style.min.css style.css && git add . && git commit -m "package ready for publishing" && git push origin package && npm publish && git switch master

author: RilDev

hooks.pre-commit: npm run build && git add style.min.css
